ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman
ayah_english: O (Prophet) (O) Prophet Fear Allah and (do) not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites Indeed Allah is All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

ayah: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wa-ittabi' ma yuha ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
ayah_english: And follow what is inspired to you from your Lord Indeed Allah is of what you do All-Aware

ayah: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا
ayah_translit: watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
ayah_english: And put your trust in Allah And Allah is sufficient And Allah is sufficient (as) Disposer of affairs

ayah: مَّا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِرَجُلٖ مِّن قَلۡبَيۡنِ فِي جَوۡفِهِۦۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزۡوَٰجَكُمُ ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔي تُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنۡهُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَدۡعِيَآءَكُمۡ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ قَوۡلُكُم بِأَفۡوَٰهِكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَقُولُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهۡدِي ٱلسَّبِيلَ
ayah_translit: ma ja'ala al-lahu lirajulin min qalbayni fi jawfihi wama ja'ala azwajakumu allai tuzahiruna min'hunna ummahatikum wama ja'ala ad'iyaakum abnaakum dhalikum qawlukum bi-afwahikum wal-lahu yaqulu al-haqa wahuwa yahdi al-sabila
ayah_english: Not Allah (has) made Allah (has) made for any man [of] two hearts in his interior And not He (has) made your wives whom you declare unlawful [of them] (as) your mothers And not He has made your adopted sons your sons That (is) your saying by your mouths but Allah says the truth and He guides (to) the Way

ayah: مَّا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِرَجُلٖ مِّن قَلۡبَيۡنِ فِي جَوۡفِهِۦۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزۡوَٰجَكُمُ ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔي تُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنۡهُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَدۡعِيَآءَكُمۡ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ قَوۡلُكُم بِأَفۡوَٰهِكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَقُولُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهۡدِي ٱلسَّبِيلَ
ayah_translit: ma ja'ala al-lahu lirajulin min qalbayni fi jawfihi wama ja'ala azwajakumu allai tuzahiruna min'hunna ummahatikum wama ja'ala ad'iyaakum abnaakum dhalikum qawlukum bi-afwahikum wal-lahu yaqulu al-haqa wahuwa yahdi al-sabila

ayah: مَّا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِرَجُلٖ مِّن قَلۡبَيۡنِ فِي جَوۡفِهِۦۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزۡوَٰجَكُمُ ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔي تُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنۡهُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَدۡعِيَآءَكُمۡ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ قَوۡلُكُم بِأَفۡوَٰهِكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَقُولُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهۡدِي ٱلسَّبِيلَ

ayah: ٱدۡعُوهُمۡ لِأٓبَآئِهِمۡ هُوَ أَقۡسَطُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن لَّمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ ءَابَآءَهُمۡ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ وَمَوَٰلِيكُمۡۚ وَلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٞ فِيمَآ أَخۡطَأۡتُم بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِن مَّا تَعَمَّدَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا
ayah_translit: id'uhum liabaihim huwa aqsatu inda al-lahi fa-in lam ta'lamu abaahum fa-ikh'wanukum fi al-dini wamawalikum walaysa alaykum junahun fima akhtatum bihi walakin ma ta'ammadat qulubukum wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: Call them by their fathers it (is) more just near Allah But if not you know their fathers then (they are) your brothers in [the] religion and your friends But not is upon you any blame in what you made a mistake in it but what intended your hearts And Allah And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah_english: Call them by their fathers it (is) more just near Allah But if not you know their fathers then (they are) your brothers in [the] religion and your friends But not is upon you any blame in what you made a mistake in it but what intended your hearts And Allah And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَوۡلَىٰ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡۖ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُۥٓ أُمَّهَٰتُهُمۡۗ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ إِلَّآ أَن تَفۡعَلُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَوۡلِيَآئِكُم مَّعۡرُوفٗاۚ كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَسۡطُورٗا
ayah_translit: al-nabiyu awla bil-mu'minina min anfusihim wa-azwajuhu ummahatuhum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi mina al-mu'minina wal-muhajirina illa an taf 'alu ila awliyaikum ma'rufan kana dhalika fi al-kitabi masturan
ayah_english: The Prophet (is) closer to the believers than their own selves and his wives (are) their mothers And possessors (of) relationships some of them (are) closer to another in (the) Decree (of) Allah than the believers and the emigrants except that you do to your friends a kindness That is That is in the Book written

ayah: ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَوۡلَىٰ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡۖ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُۥٓ أُمَّهَٰتُهُمۡۗ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ إِلَّآ أَن تَفۡعَلُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَوۡلِيَآئِكُم مَّعۡرُوفٗاۚ كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَسۡطُورٗا

ayah: ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَوۡلَىٰ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡۖ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُۥٓ أُمَّهَٰتُهُمۡۗ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ إِلَّآ أَن تَفۡعَلُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَوۡلِيَآئِكُم مَّعۡرُوفٗاۚ كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَسۡطُورٗا

ayah: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِيثَٰقَهُمۡ وَمِنكَ وَمِن نُّوحٖ وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَۖ وَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡهُم مِّيثَٰقًا غَلِيظٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh akhadhna mina al-nabiyina mithaqahum waminka wamin nuhin wa-ib'rahima wamusa wa'isa ib'ni maryama wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan
ayah_english: And when We took from the Prophets their Covenant and from you and from Nuh and Ibrahim and Musa and Isa son (of) Maryam And We took from them a covenant strong

ayah_translit: wa-idh akhadhna mina al-nabiyina mithaqahum waminka wamin nuhin wa-ib'rahima wamusa wa'isa ib'ni maryama wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan

ayah: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: liyasala al-sadiqina an sid'qihim wa-a'adda lil'kafirina adhaban aliman
ayah_english: That He may ask the truthful about their truth And He has prepared for the disbelievers a punishment painful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَتۡكُمۡ جُنُودٞ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا وَجُنُودٗا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh jaatkum junudun fa-arsalna alayhim rihan wajunudan lam tarawha wakana al-lahu bima ta'maluna basiran
ayah_english: O you who believe Remember (the) Favor (of) Allah upon you when came to you (the) hosts and We sent upon them a wind and hosts not you (could) see them And Allah is And Allah is of what you do All-Seer

ayah_english: O you who believe Remember (the) Favor (of) Allah upon you when came to you (the) hosts and We sent upon them a wind and hosts not you (could) see them And Allah is And Allah is of what you do All-Seer

ayah: إِذۡ جَآءُوكُم مِّن فَوۡقِكُمۡ وَمِنۡ أَسۡفَلَ مِنكُمۡ وَإِذۡ زَاغَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَبَلَغَتِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلۡحَنَاجِرَ وَتَظُنُّونَ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلظُّنُونَا۠
ayah_translit: idh jaukum min fawqikum wamin asfala minkum wa-idh zaghati al-absaru wabalaghati al-qulubu al-hanajira watazunnuna bil-lahi al-zununa
ayah_english: When they came upon you from above you and from below you and when grew wild the eyes and reached the hearts the throats and you assumed about Allah the assumptions

ayah: إِذۡ جَآءُوكُم مِّن فَوۡقِكُمۡ وَمِنۡ أَسۡفَلَ مِنكُمۡ وَإِذۡ زَاغَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَبَلَغَتِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلۡحَنَاجِرَ وَتَظُنُّونَ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلظُّنُونَا۠
ayah_translit: idh jaukum min fawqikum wamin asfala minkum wa-idh zaghati al-absaru wabalaghati al-qulubu al-hanajira watazunnuna bil-lahi al-zununa

ayah: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا
ayah_translit: hunalika ub'tuliya al-mu'minuna wazul'zilu zil'zalan shadidan
ayah_english: There were tried the believers and shaken (with a) shake severe

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ مَّا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِلَّا غُرُورٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh yaqulu al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun ma wa'adana al-lahu warasuluhu illa ghururan
ayah_english: And when said the hypocrites and those in their hearts (was) a disease Not Allah promised us Allah promised us and His messenger except delusion

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَـٰٓأَهۡلَ يَثۡرِبَ لَا مُقَامَ لَكُمۡ فَٱرۡجِعُواْۚ وَيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ بُيُوتَنَا عَوۡرَةٞ وَمَا هِيَ بِعَوۡرَةٍۖ إِن يُرِيدُونَ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh qalat taifatun min'hum yaahla yathriba la muqama lakum fa-ir'ji'u wayastadhinu fariqun min'humu al-nabiya yaquluna inna buyutana awratun wama hiya bi'awratin in yuriduna illa firaran
ayah_english: And when said a party of them O People (of) Yathrib! No stand for you so return And asked permission a group of them (from) the Prophet saying Indeed our houses (are) exposed and not they (were) exposed Not they wished but to flee

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَـٰٓأَهۡلَ يَثۡرِبَ لَا مُقَامَ لَكُمۡ فَٱرۡجِعُواْۚ وَيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ بُيُوتَنَا عَوۡرَةٞ وَمَا هِيَ بِعَوۡرَةٍۖ إِن يُرِيدُونَ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَـٰٓأَهۡلَ يَثۡرِبَ لَا مُقَامَ لَكُمۡ فَٱرۡجِعُواْۚ وَيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ بُيُوتَنَا عَوۡرَةٞ وَمَا هِيَ بِعَوۡرَةٍۖ إِن يُرِيدُونَ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا

ayah: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا
ayah_translit: walaw dukhilat alayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu al-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
ayah_english: And if had been entered upon them from all its sides then they had been asked the treachery they (would) have certainly done it and not they (would) have hesitated over it except a little

ayah_translit: walaw dukhilat alayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu al-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
ayah_english: And if had been entered upon them from all its sides then they had been asked the treachery they (would) have certainly done it and not they (would) have hesitated over it except a little

ayah: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا

ayah: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا
ayah_translit: walaw dukhilat alayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu al-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
ayah_english: And if had been entered upon them from all its sides then they had been asked the treachery they (would) have certainly done it and not they (would) have hesitated over it except a little

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad kanu ahadu al-laha min qablu la yuwalluna al-adbara wakana ahdu al-lahi masulan
ayah_english: And certainly they had promised Allah before before not they would turn their backs And is (the) promise (to) Allah to be questioned

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

ayah_english: And certainly they had promised Allah before before not they would turn their backs And is (the) promise (to) Allah to be questioned

ayah: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
ayah_english: Say Never will benefit you the fleeing if you flee from death or killing and then not you will be allowed to enjoy except a little

ayah: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
ayah_english: Say Never will benefit you the fleeing if you flee from death or killing and then not you will be allowed to enjoy except a little

ayah_english: Say Never will benefit you the fleeing if you flee from death or killing and then not you will be allowed to enjoy except a little
word_tranlation: you will be allowed to enjoy

ayah_translit: qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
ayah_english: Say Never will benefit you the fleeing if you flee from death or killing and then not you will be allowed to enjoy except a little

ayah: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
ayah_english: Say Never will benefit you the fleeing if you flee from death or killing and then not you will be allowed to enjoy except a little

ayah: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: qul man dha alladhi ya'simukum mina al-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
ayah_english: Say Who (is) it that (is) it that (can) protect you from Allah If He intends for you any harm or He intends for you a mercy And not they will find for them besides besides Allah any protector and not any helper

ayah: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: qul man dha alladhi ya'simukum mina al-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
ayah_english: Say Who (is) it that (is) it that (can) protect you from Allah If He intends for you any harm or He intends for you a mercy And not they will find for them besides besides Allah any protector and not any helper

ayah: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: qul man dha alladhi ya'simukum mina al-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
ayah_english: Say Who (is) it that (is) it that (can) protect you from Allah If He intends for you any harm or He intends for you a mercy And not they will find for them besides besides Allah any protector and not any helper

ayah: ۞قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
ayah_translit: qad ya'lamu al-lahu al-mu'awiqina minkum wal-qailina li-ikh'wanihim halumma ilayna wala yatuna al-basa illa qalilan
ayah_english: Verily Allah knows Allah knows those who hinder among you and those who say to their brothers Come to us and not they come (to) the battle except a few

ayah: ۞قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

ayah_english: Verily Allah knows Allah knows those who hinder among you and those who say to their brothers Come to us and not they come (to) the battle except a few

ayah: أَشِحَّةً عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ ٱلۡخَوۡفُ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ تَدُورُ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِي يُغۡشَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ فَإِذَا ذَهَبَ ٱلۡخَوۡفُ سَلَقُوكُم بِأَلۡسِنَةٍ حِدَادٍ أَشِحَّةً عَلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ فَأَحۡبَطَ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا
ayah_translit: ashihhatan alaykum fa-idha jaa al-khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuruna ilayka taduru a'yunuhum ka-alladhi yugh'sha alayhi mina al-mawti fa-idha dhahaba al-khawfu salaqukum bi-alsinatin hidadin ashihhatan ala al-khayri ulaika lam yu'minu fa-ahbata al-lahu a'malahum wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
ayah_english: Miserly towards you But when comes the fear you see them looking at you revolving their eyes like one who faints faints from [the] death But when departs the fear they smite you with tongues sharp miserly towards the good Those not they have believed so Allah made worthless so Allah made worthless their deeds And is that for Allah easy

ayah_translit: ashihhatan alaykum fa-idha jaa al-khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuruna ilayka taduru a'yunuhum ka-alladhi yugh'sha alayhi mina al-mawti fa-idha dhahaba al-khawfu salaqukum bi-alsinatin hidadin ashihhatan ala al-khayri ulaika lam yu'minu fa-ahbata al-lahu a'malahum wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran

ayah: أَشِحَّةً عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ ٱلۡخَوۡفُ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ تَدُورُ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِي يُغۡشَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ فَإِذَا ذَهَبَ ٱلۡخَوۡفُ سَلَقُوكُم بِأَلۡسِنَةٍ حِدَادٍ أَشِحَّةً عَلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ فَأَحۡبَطَ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

ayah_english: Miserly towards you But when comes the fear you see them looking at you revolving their eyes like one who faints faints from [the] death But when departs the fear they smite you with tongues sharp miserly towards the good Those not they have believed so Allah made worthless so Allah made worthless their deeds And is that for Allah easy

ayah: يَحۡسَبُونَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابَ لَمۡ يَذۡهَبُواْۖ وَإِن يَأۡتِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ يَوَدُّواْ لَوۡ أَنَّهُم بَادُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ يَسۡـَٔلُونَ عَنۡ أَنۢبَآئِكُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ فِيكُم مَّا قَٰتَلُوٓاْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: yahsabuna al-ahzaba lam yadhhabu wa-in yati al-ahzabu yawaddu law annahum baduna fi al-a'rabi yasaluna an anbaikum walaw kanu fikum ma qatalu illa qalilan
ayah_english: They think the confederates (have) not withdrawn And if (should) come the confederates they would wish if that they (were) living in (the) desert among the Bedouins asking about your news And if they were among you not they would fight except a little

ayah: يَحۡسَبُونَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابَ لَمۡ يَذۡهَبُواْۖ وَإِن يَأۡتِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ يَوَدُّواْ لَوۡ أَنَّهُم بَادُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ يَسۡـَٔلُونَ عَنۡ أَنۢبَآئِكُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ فِيكُم مَّا قَٰتَلُوٓاْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

ayah: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا
ayah_translit: laqad kana lakum fi rasuli al-lahi us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju al-laha wal-yawma al-akhira wadhakara al-laha kathiran
ayah_english: Certainly is for you in (the) Messenger (of) Allah an excellent example an excellent example for (one) who has hope (in) Allah and the Day the Last and remembers Allah much

ayah_translit: laqad kana lakum fi rasuli al-lahi us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju al-laha wal-yawma al-akhira wadhakara al-laha kathiran
ayah_english: Certainly is for you in (the) Messenger (of) Allah an excellent example an excellent example for (one) who has hope (in) Allah and the Day the Last and remembers Allah much

ayah: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا

ayah: وَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابَ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَصَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ وَمَا زَادَهُمۡ إِلَّآ إِيمَٰنٗا وَتَسۡلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: walamma raa al-mu'minuna al-ahzaba qalu hadha ma wa'adana al-lahu warasuluhu wasadaqa al-lahu warasuluhu wama zadahum illa imanan watasliman
ayah_english: And when saw the believers the confederates they said This (is) what Allah promised us Allah promised us and His Messenger and Allah spoke the truth and Allah spoke the truth and His Messenger And not it increased them except (in) faith and submission

ayah: مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رِجَالٞ صَدَقُواْ مَا عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡهِۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّن قَضَىٰ نَحۡبَهُۥ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنتَظِرُۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُواْ تَبۡدِيلٗا
ayah_translit: mina al-mu'minina rijalun sadaqu ma ahadu al-laha alayhi famin'hum man qada nahbahu wamin'hum man yantaziru wama baddalu tabdilan
ayah_english: Among the believers (are) men (who) have been true (to) what they promised Allah they promised Allah [on it] And among them (is he) who has fulfilled his vow and among them (is he) who awaits And not they alter (by) any alteration

ayah: مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رِجَالٞ صَدَقُواْ مَا عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡهِۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّن قَضَىٰ نَحۡبَهُۥ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنتَظِرُۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُواْ تَبۡدِيلٗا

ayah: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: liyajziya al-lahu al-sadiqina bisid'qihim wayu'adhiba al-munafiqina in shaa aw yatuba alayhim inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: That Allah may reward That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or turn in mercy to them Indeed Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: liyajziya al-lahu al-sadiqina bisid'qihim wayu'adhiba al-munafiqina in shaa aw yatuba alayhim inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman

ayah: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah_english: That Allah may reward That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or turn in mercy to them Indeed Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۚ وَكَفَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلۡقِتَالَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزِيزٗا
ayah_translit: waradda al-lahu alladhina kafaru bighayzihim lam yanalu khayran wakafa al-lahu al-mu'minina al-qitala wakana al-lahu qawiyyan azizan
ayah_english: And Allah turned back And Allah turned back those who disbelieved in their rage not they obtained any good And sufficient is Allah (for) the believers (in) the battle and Allah is and Allah is All-Strong All-Mighty

ayah: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۚ وَكَفَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلۡقِتَالَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزِيزٗا

ayah: وَأَنزَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَٰهَرُوهُم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن صَيَاصِيهِمۡ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ وَتَأۡسِرُونَ فَرِيقٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anzala alladhina zaharuhum min ahli al-kitabi min sayasihim waqadhafa fi qulubihimu al-ru'ba fariqan taqtuluna watasiruna fariqan
ayah_english: And He brought down those who backed them among (the) People (of) the Scripture from their fortresses and cast into their hearts [the] terror a group you killed and you took captive a group

ayah: وَأَنزَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَٰهَرُوهُم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن صَيَاصِيهِمۡ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ وَتَأۡسِرُونَ فَرِيقٗا

ayah: وَأَوۡرَثَكُمۡ أَرۡضَهُمۡ وَدِيَٰرَهُمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ وَأَرۡضٗا لَّمۡ تَطَـُٔوهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wa-awrathakum ardahum wadiyarahum wa-amwalahum wa-ardan lam tatauha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin qadiran
ayah_english: And He caused you to inherit their land and their houses and their properties and a land not you (had) trodden And Allah is And Allah is on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا فَتَعَالَيۡنَ أُمَتِّعۡكُنَّ وَأُسَرِّحۡكُنَّ سَرَاحٗا جَمِيلٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu qul li-azwajika in kuntunna turid'na al-hayata al-dun'ya wazinataha fata'alayna umatti'kunna wa-usarrih'kunna sarahan jamilan
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Say to your wives If you desire the life (of) the world and its adornment then come I will provide for you and release you (with) a release good

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا فَتَعَالَيۡنَ أُمَتِّعۡكُنَّ وَأُسَرِّحۡكُنَّ سَرَاحٗا جَمِيلٗا

ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Say to your wives If you desire the life (of) the world and its adornment then come I will provide for you and release you (with) a release good

ayah: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
ayah_translit: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasulahu wal-dara al-akhirata fa-inna al-laha a'adda lil'muh'sinati minkunna ajran aziman
ayah_english: But if you desire Allah and His Messenger and the Home (of) the Hereafter then indeed Allah has prepared for the good-doers among you a reward great

ayah: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

ayah: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ مَن يَأۡتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفَٰحِشَةٖ مُّبَيِّنَةٖ يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهَا ٱلۡعَذَابُ ضِعۡفَيۡنِۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا
ayah_translit: yanisaa al-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifahishatin mubayyinatin yuda'af laha al-'adhabu di'fayni wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
ayah_english: O wives (of) the Prophet Whoever commits from you immorality clear will be doubled for her the punishment two fold And that is And that is for Allah easy

ayah_english: O wives (of) the Prophet Whoever commits from you immorality clear will be doubled for her the punishment two fold And that is And that is for Allah easy

ayah: ۞وَمَن يَقۡنُتۡ مِنكُنَّ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحٗا نُّؤۡتِهَآ أَجۡرَهَا مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهَا رِزۡقٗا كَرِيمٗا
ayah_translit: waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasulihi wata'mal salihan nu'tiha ajraha marratayni wa-a'tadna laha riz'qan kariman
ayah_english: And whoever is obedient among you to Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness We will give her her reward twice and We have prepared for her a provision noble

ayah: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ لَسۡتُنَّ كَأَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِنِ ٱتَّقَيۡتُنَّۚ فَلَا تَخۡضَعۡنَ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَيَطۡمَعَ ٱلَّذِي فِي قَلۡبِهِۦ مَرَضٞ وَقُلۡنَ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا
ayah_translit: yanisaa al-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina al-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhda'na bil-qawli fayatma'a alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan ma'rufan
ayah_english: O wives (of) the Prophet! You are not like anyone among the women If you fear (Allah) then (do) not be soft in speech lest should be moved with desire he who in his heart (is) a disease but say a word appropriate

ayah: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ لَسۡتُنَّ كَأَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِنِ ٱتَّقَيۡتُنَّۚ فَلَا تَخۡضَعۡنَ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَيَطۡمَعَ ٱلَّذِي فِي قَلۡبِهِۦ مَرَضٞ وَقُلۡنَ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا

ayah: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ لَسۡتُنَّ كَأَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِنِ ٱتَّقَيۡتُنَّۚ فَلَا تَخۡضَعۡنَ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَيَطۡمَعَ ٱلَّذِي فِي قَلۡبِهِۦ مَرَضٞ وَقُلۡنَ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا
ayah_translit: yanisaa al-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina al-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhda'na bil-qawli fayatma'a alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan ma'rufan
ayah_english: O wives (of) the Prophet! You are not like anyone among the women If you fear (Allah) then (do) not be soft in speech lest should be moved with desire he who in his heart (is) a disease but say a word appropriate

ayah: وَقَرۡنَ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ وَلَا تَبَرَّجۡنَ تَبَرُّجَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَأَقِمۡنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتِينَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِعۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمۡ تَطۡهِيرٗا
ayah_translit: waqarna fi buyutikunna wala tabarrajna tabarruja al-jahiliyati al-ula wa-aqim'na al-salata waatina al-zakata wa-ati'na al-laha warasulahu innama yuridu al-lahu liyudh'hiba ankumu al-rij'sa ahla al-bayti wayutahhirakum tathiran
ayah_english: And stay in your houses and (do) not display yourselves (as was the) display (of the times of) ignorance the former And establish the prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger Only Allah wishes Allah wishes to remove from you the impurity (O) People (of) the House And to purify you (with thorough) purification

ayah: وَقَرۡنَ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ وَلَا تَبَرَّجۡنَ تَبَرُّجَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَأَقِمۡنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتِينَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِعۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمۡ تَطۡهِيرٗا

ayah_english: And stay in your houses and (do) not display yourselves (as was the) display (of the times of) ignorance the former And establish the prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger Only Allah wishes Allah wishes to remove from you the impurity (O) People (of) the House And to purify you (with thorough) purification

ayah: وَقَرۡنَ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ وَلَا تَبَرَّجۡنَ تَبَرُّجَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَأَقِمۡنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتِينَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِعۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمۡ تَطۡهِيرٗا

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur'na ma yut'la fi buyutikunna min ayati al-lahi wal-hik'mati inna al-laha kana latifan khabiran
ayah_english: And remember what is recited in your houses of (the) Verses (of) Allah and the wisdom Indeed Allah is All-Subtle All-Aware

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ وَٱلۡمُسۡلِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمۡ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظَٰتِ وَٱلذَّـٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱلذَّـٰكِرَٰتِ أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
ayah_translit: inna al-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati wal-sadiqina wal-sadiqati wal-sabirina wal-sabirati wal-khashi'ina wal-khashi'ati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati wal-saimina wal-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wal-dhakirina al-laha kathiran wal-dhakirati a'adda al-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran aziman
ayah_english: Indeed the Muslim men and the Muslim women and the believing men and the believing women and the obedient men and the obedient women and the truthful men and the truthful women and the patient men and the patient women and the humble men and the humble women and the men who give charity and the women who give charity and the men who fast and the women who fast and the men who guard their chastity and the women who guard (it) and the men who remember Allah much and the women who remember Allah has prepared Allah has prepared for them forgiveness and a reward great

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ وَٱلۡمُسۡلِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمۡ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظَٰتِ وَٱلذَّـٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱلذَّـٰكِرَٰتِ أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ وَٱلۡمُسۡلِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمۡ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظَٰتِ وَٱلذَّـٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱلذَّـٰكِرَٰتِ أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ وَٱلۡمُسۡلِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ وَٱلۡخَٰشِعَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقَٰتِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰٓئِمَٰتِ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمۡ وَٱلۡحَٰفِظَٰتِ وَٱلذَّـٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱلذَّـٰكِرَٰتِ أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
ayah_translit: inna al-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati wal-sadiqina wal-sadiqati wal-sabirina wal-sabirati wal-khashi'ina wal-khashi'ati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati wal-saimina wal-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wal-dhakirina al-laha kathiran wal-dhakirati a'adda al-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran aziman
ayah_english: Indeed the Muslim men and the Muslim women and the believing men and the believing women and the obedient men and the obedient women and the truthful men and the truthful women and the patient men and the patient women and the humble men and the humble women and the men who give charity and the women who give charity and the men who fast and the women who fast and the men who guard their chastity and the women who guard (it) and the men who remember Allah much and the women who remember Allah has prepared Allah has prepared for them forgiveness and a reward great

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِمُؤۡمِنٖ وَلَا مُؤۡمِنَةٍ إِذَا قَضَى ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَمۡرًا أَن يَكُونَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِمۡۗ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ ضَلَٰلٗا مُّبِينٗا
ayah_translit: wama kana limu'minin wala mu'minatin idha qada al-lahu warasuluhu amran an yakuna lahumu al-khiyaratu min amrihim waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu faqad dalla dalalan mubinan
ayah_english: And not (it) is for a believing man and not (for) a believing woman when Allah has decided Allah has decided and His Messenger a matter that (there) should be for them (any) choice about their affair And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger certainly he (has) strayed (into) error clear

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِمُؤۡمِنٖ وَلَا مُؤۡمِنَةٍ إِذَا قَضَى ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَمۡرًا أَن يَكُونَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِمۡۗ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ ضَلَٰلٗا مُّبِينٗا

ayah_translit: wama kana limu'minin wala mu'minatin idha qada al-lahu warasuluhu amran an yakuna lahumu al-khiyaratu min amrihim waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu faqad dalla dalalan mubinan

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
ayah_english: And when you said to the one Allah bestowed favor Allah bestowed favor on him and you bestowed favor on him Keep to yourself your wife and fear Allah But you concealed within yourself what Allah (was to) disclose And you fear the people while Allah has more right that you (should) fear Him So when ended Zaid from her necessary (formalities) We married her to you so that not there be on the believers any discomfort concerning the wives (of) their adopted sons when they have ended from them necessary (formalities) And is (the) Command (of) Allah accomplished

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan

ayah: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَمۡسِكۡ عَلَيۡكَ زَوۡجَكَ وَٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ مَفۡعُولٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
ayah_english: And when you said to the one Allah bestowed favor Allah bestowed favor on him and you bestowed favor on him Keep to yourself your wife and fear Allah But you concealed within yourself what Allah (was to) disclose And you fear the people while Allah has more right that you (should) fear Him So when ended Zaid from her necessary (formalities) We married her to you so that not there be on the believers any discomfort concerning the wives (of) their adopted sons when they have ended from them necessary (formalities) And is (the) Command (of) Allah accomplished

ayah: مَّا كَانَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّ مِنۡ حَرَجٖ فِيمَا فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥۖ سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ قَدَرٗا مَّقۡدُورًا
ayah_translit: ma kana ala al-nabiyi min harajin fima farada al-lahu lahu sunnata al-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu wakana amru al-lahi qadaran maqduran
ayah_english: Not (there can) be upon the Prophet any discomfort in what Allah has imposed Allah has imposed on him (That is the) Way (of) Allah concerning those who passed away before before And is (the) Command (of) Allah a decree destined

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا
ayah_translit: alladhina yuballighuna risalati al-lahi wayakhshawnahu wala yakhshawna ahadan illa al-laha wakafa bil-lahi hasiban
ayah_english: Those who convey (the) Messages (of) Allah and fear Him and (do) not fear anyone except Allah And sufficient is Allah And sufficient is Allah (as) a Reckoner

ayah: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَآ أَحَدٖ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن رَّسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: ma kana muhammadun aba ahadin min rijalikum walakin rasula al-lahi wakhatama al-nabiyina wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin aliman
ayah_english: Not is Muhammad (the) father (of) anyone of your men but (he is the) Messenger (of) Allah and Seal (of) the Prophets And Allah is And Allah is of every thing All-Knower

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ ذِكۡرٗا كَثِيرٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru al-laha dhik'ran kathiran
ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe Remember Allah (with) remembrance much

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ ذِكۡرٗا كَثِيرٗا

ayah: وَسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا
ayah_translit: wasabbihuhu buk'ratan wa-asilan
ayah_english: And glorify Him morning and evening

ayah: وَسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا
ayah_translit: wasabbihuhu buk'ratan wa-asilan

ayah: وَسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا
ayah_translit: wasabbihuhu buk'ratan wa-asilan
ayah_english: And glorify Him morning and evening

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَلِّي عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yusalli alaykum wamalaikatuhu liyukh'rijakum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri wakana bil-mu'minina rahiman
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sends His blessings upon you and His Angels so that He may bring you out from the darkness[es] to the light And He is to the believers Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَلِّي عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَحِيمٗا

ayah: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا
ayah_translit: tahiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salamun wa-a'adda lahum ajran kariman
ayah_english: Their greetings (on the) Day they will meet Him (will be) Peace and He has prepared for them a reward noble

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashiran wanadhiran
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We have sent you (as) a witness and a bearer of glad tidings and (as) a warner

ayah: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wada'iyan ila al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirajan muniran
ayah_english: And as one who invites to Allah by His permission and (as) a lamp illuminating

ayah_translit: wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina wada' adhahum watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نَكَحۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ طَلَّقۡتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ فَمَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِنۡ عِدَّةٖ تَعۡتَدُّونَهَاۖ فَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ وَسَرِّحُوهُنَّ سَرَاحٗا جَمِيلٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nakahtumu al-mu'minati thumma tallaqtumuhunna min qabli an tamassuhunna fama lakum alayhinna min iddatin ta'taddunaha famatti'uhunna wasarrihuhunna sarahan jamilan
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe When you marry believing women and then divorce them before before [that] you have touched them then not for you on them any waiting period (to) count concerning them So provide for them and release them (with) a release good

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نَكَحۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ طَلَّقۡتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ فَمَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِنۡ عِدَّةٖ تَعۡتَدُّونَهَاۖ فَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ وَسَرِّحُوهُنَّ سَرَاحٗا جَمِيلٗا

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allati atayta ujurahunna wama malakat yaminuka mimma afaa al-lahu alayka wabanati ammika wabanati ammatika wabanati khalika wabanati khalatika allati hajarna ma'aka wa-im'ra-atan mu'minatan in wahabat nafsaha lilnnabiyyi in arada al-nabiyu an yastankihaha khalisatan laka min duni al-mu'minina qad alim'na ma faradna alayhim fi azwajihim wama malakat aymanuhum likayla yakuna alayka harajun wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allati atayta ujurahunna wama malakat yaminuka mimma afaa al-lahu alayka wabanati ammika wabanati ammatika wabanati khalika wabanati khalatika allati hajarna ma'aka wa-im'ra-atan mu'minatan in wahabat nafsaha lilnnabiyyi in arada al-nabiyu an yastankihaha khalisatan laka min duni al-mu'minina qad alim'na ma faradna alayhim fi azwajihim wama malakat aymanuhum likayla yakuna alayka harajun wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allati atayta ujurahunna wama malakat yaminuka mimma afaa al-lahu alayka wabanati ammika wabanati ammatika wabanati khalika wabanati khalatika allati hajarna ma'aka wa-im'ra-atan mu'minatan in wahabat nafsaha lilnnabiyyi in arada al-nabiyu an yastankihaha khalisatan laka min duni al-mu'minina qad alim'na ma faradna alayhim fi azwajihim wama malakat aymanuhum likayla yakuna alayka harajun wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّـٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّـٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّـٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Indeed, We [We] have made lawful to you your wives (to) whom you have given their bridal money and whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess from those (whom) Allah has given Allah has given to you and (the) daughters (of) your paternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your paternal aunts and (the) daughters (of) your maternal uncles and (the) daughters (of) your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a woman believing if she gives herself to the Prophet if wishes the Prophet to marry her only for you excluding excluding the believers Certainly We know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and whom they rightfully possess they rightfully possess that not should be on you any discomfort And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: ۞تُرۡجِي مَن تَشَآءُ مِنۡهُنَّ وَتُـٔۡوِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ مَن تَشَآءُۖ وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعۡيُنُهُنَّ وَلَا يَحۡزَنَّ وَيَرۡضَيۡنَ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: tur'ji man tashau min'hunna watu'wi ilayka man tashau wamani ib'taghayta mimman azalta fala junaha alayka dhalika adna an taqarra a'yunuhunna wala yahzanna wayardayna bima ataytahunna kulluhunna wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi qulubikum wakana al-lahu aliman haliman
ayah_english: You may defer whom you will of them or you may take to yourself whom you will And whoever you desire of those whom you (had) set aside then (there is) no blame upon you That (is) more suitable that may be cooled their eyes and not they grieve and they may be pleased with what you have given them all of them And Allah knows what (is) in your hearts And Allah is And Allah is All-Knower Most Forbearing

ayah: ۞تُرۡجِي مَن تَشَآءُ مِنۡهُنَّ وَتُـٔۡوِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ مَن تَشَآءُۖ وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعۡيُنُهُنَّ وَلَا يَحۡزَنَّ وَيَرۡضَيۡنَ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَلِيمٗا

ayah: ۞تُرۡجِي مَن تَشَآءُ مِنۡهُنَّ وَتُـٔۡوِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ مَن تَشَآءُۖ وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعۡيُنُهُنَّ وَلَا يَحۡزَنَّ وَيَرۡضَيۡنَ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَلِيمٗا

ayah_english: You may defer whom you will of them or you may take to yourself whom you will And whoever you desire of those whom you (had) set aside then (there is) no blame upon you That (is) more suitable that may be cooled their eyes and not they grieve and they may be pleased with what you have given them all of them And Allah knows what (is) in your hearts And Allah is And Allah is All-Knower Most Forbearing

ayah: لَّا يَحِلُّ لَكَ ٱلنِّسَآءُ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَلَآ أَن تَبَدَّلَ بِهِنَّ مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجٖ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ حُسۡنُهُنَّ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رَّقِيبٗا
ayah_translit: la yahillu laka al-nisau min ba'du wala an tabaddala bihinna min azwajin walaw a'jabaka hus'nuhunna illa ma malakat yaminuka wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin raqiban
ayah_english: (It is) not lawful for you (to marry) women after (this) after (this) and not to exchange them for (other) wives even if pleases you their beauty except whom you rightfully possess you rightfully possess And Allah is And Allah is over all things an Observer

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe (Do) not enter (the) houses (of) the Prophet except when permission is given to you for a meal without awaiting its preparation But when you are invited then enter and when you have eaten then disperse and not seeking to remain for a conversation Indeed that was troubling the Prophet and he is shy of (dismissing) you But Allah is not shy is not shy of the truth And when you ask them for something then ask them from behind a screen That (is) purer for your hearts and their hearts And not is for you that you trouble (the) Messenger (of) Allah and not that you should marry his wives after him after him ever Indeed that is near Allah an enormity

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ طَعَامٍ غَيۡرَ نَٰظِرِينَ إِنَىٰهُ وَلَٰكِنۡ إِذَا دُعِيتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُواْ فَإِذَا طَعِمۡتُمۡ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ وَلَا مُسۡتَـٔۡنِسِينَ لِحَدِيثٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَطۡهَرُ لِقُلُوبِكُمۡ وَقُلُوبِهِنَّۚ وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا

ayah: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: in tub'du shayan aw tukh'fuhu fa-inna al-laha kana bikulli shayin aliman
ayah_english: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it indeed Allah is of all things All-Knower

ayah: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ فِيٓ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ أَخَوَٰتِهِنَّ وَلَا نِسَآئِهِنَّ وَلَا مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُنَّۗ وَٱتَّقِينَ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا
ayah_translit: la junaha alayhinna fi abaihinna wala abnaihinna wala ikh'wanihinna wala abnai ikh'wanihinna wala abnai akhawatihinna wala nisaihinna wala ma malakat aymanuhunna wa-ittaqina al-laha inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin shahidan
ayah_english: (There is) no blame upon them concerning their fathers and not their sons and not their brothers and not sons (of) their brothers and not sons (of) their sisters and not their women and not what they rightfully possess they rightfully possess And fear Allah Indeed Allah is over all things a Witness

ayah: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ فِيٓ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ أَخَوَٰتِهِنَّ وَلَا نِسَآئِهِنَّ وَلَا مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُنَّۗ وَٱتَّقِينَ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ صَلُّواْ عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُواْ تَسۡلِيمًا
ayah_translit: inna al-laha wamalaikatahu yusalluna ala al-nabiyi yaayyuha alladhina amanu sallu alayhi wasallimu tasliman
ayah_english: Indeed Allah and His Angels send blessings upon the Prophet O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe Send blessings on him and greet him (with) greetings

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yu'dhuna al-laha warasulahu la'anahumu al-lahu fi al-dun'ya wal-akhirati wa-a'adda lahum adhaban muhinan
ayah_english: Indeed those who annoy Allah and His Messenger Allah has cursed them Allah has cursed them in the world and the Hereafter and has prepared for them a punishment humiliating

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ فَقَدِ ٱحۡتَمَلُواْ بُهۡتَٰنٗا وَإِثۡمٗا مُّبِينٗا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yu'dhuna al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati bighayri ma ik'tasabu faqadi ih'tamalu buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan
ayah_english: And those who harm the believing men and the believing women for other than what they have earned then certainly they bear false accusation and sin manifest

ayah_english: And those who harm the believing men and the believing women for other than what they have earned then certainly they bear false accusation and sin manifest

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَآءِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يُدۡنِينَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِن جَلَٰبِيبِهِنَّۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu qul li-azwajika wabanatika wanisai al-mu'minina yud'nina alayhinna min jalabibihinna dhalika adna an yu'rafna fala yu'dhayna wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: O Prophet O Prophet Say to your wives and your daughters and (the) women (of) the believers to bring down over themselves of their outer garments That (is) more suitable that they should be known and not harmed And is Allah Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَآءِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يُدۡنِينَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِن جَلَٰبِيبِهِنَّۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَآءِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يُدۡنِينَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِن جَلَٰبِيبِهِنَّۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

ayah: ۞لَّئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡمُرۡجِفُونَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَنُغۡرِيَنَّكَ بِهِمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: la-in lam yantahi al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun wal-mur'jifuna fi al-madinati lanugh'riyannaka bihim thumma la yujawirunaka fiha illa qalilan
ayah_english: If (do) not cease the hypocrites and those who in their hearts (is) a disease and those who spread rumors in the city We will let you overpower them We will let you overpower them then not they will remain your neighbors therein except (for) a little

ayah: ۞لَّئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡمُرۡجِفُونَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَنُغۡرِيَنَّكَ بِهِمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

ayah: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا
ayah_translit: mal'unina aynama thuqifu ukhidhu waquttilu taqtilan
ayah_english: Accursed wherever they are found they are seized and massacred completely and massacred completely

ayah: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا
ayah_translit: sunnata al-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdilan
ayah_english: (Such is the) Way (of) Allah with those who passed away before before and never you will find in (the) Way (of) Allah any change

ayah: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

ayah: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

ayah: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
ayah_translit: yasaluka al-nasu ani al-sa'ati qul innama il'muha inda al-lahi wama yud'rika la'alla al-sa'ata takunu qariban
ayah_english: Ask you the people about the Hour Say Only its knowledge (is) with Allah And what will make you know Perhaps the Hour is near

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا
ayah_translit: inna al-laha la'ana al-kafirina wa-a'adda lahum sa'iran
ayah_english: Indeed Allah has cursed the disbelievers and has prepared for them a Blaze

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha abadan la yajiduna waliyyan wala nasiran
ayah_english: Abiding therein forever not they will find any protector and not any helper

ayah: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠
ayah_translit: yawma tuqallabu wujuhuhum fi al-nari yaquluna yalaytana ata'na al-laha wa-ata'na al-rasula
ayah_english: (The) Day will be turned about their faces in the Fire they will say O we wish we (had) obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!

ayah: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

ayah: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
ayah_translit: waqalu rabbana inna ata'na sadatana wakubaraana fa-adalluna al-sabila
ayah_english: And they will say Our Lord! Indeed we [we] obeyed our chiefs and our great men and they misled us (from) the Way

ayah: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: rabbana atihim di'fayni mina al-'adhabi wal-'anhum la'nan kabiran
ayah_english: Our Lord! Give them double [of] punishment and curse them (with) a curse great

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡاْ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُواْۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهٗا
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takunu ka-alladhina adhaw musa fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimma qalu wakana inda al-lahi wajihan
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe (Do) not be like those who annoyed Musa then Allah cleared him then Allah cleared him of what they said And he was near Allah honorable

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takunu ka-alladhina adhaw musa fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimma qalu wakana inda al-lahi wajihan

ayah: يُصۡلِحۡ لَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدۡ فَازَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا
ayah_translit: yus'lih lakum a'malakum wayaghfir lakum dhunubakum waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu faqad faza fawzan aziman
ayah_english: He will amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger certainly has attained an attainment great

ayah: إِنَّا عَرَضۡنَا ٱلۡأَمَانَةَ عَلَى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلۡجِبَالِ فَأَبَيۡنَ أَن يَحۡمِلۡنَهَا وَأَشۡفَقۡنَ مِنۡهَا وَحَمَلَهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ ظَلُومٗا جَهُولٗا
ayah_translit: inna aradna al-amanata ala al-samawati wal-ardi wal-jibali fa-abayna an yahmil'naha wa-ashfaqna min'ha wahamalaha al-insanu innahu kana zaluman jahulan
ayah_english: Indeed [We] offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains but they refused to bear it and they feared from it but bore it the man Indeed he was very unjust very ignorant

ayah_english: Indeed [We] offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains but they refused to bear it and they feared from it but bore it the man Indeed he was very unjust very ignorant

ayah: إِنَّا عَرَضۡنَا ٱلۡأَمَانَةَ عَلَى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلۡجِبَالِ فَأَبَيۡنَ أَن يَحۡمِلۡنَهَا وَأَشۡفَقۡنَ مِنۡهَا وَحَمَلَهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ ظَلُومٗا جَهُولٗا

ayah: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكَٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمَۢا
ayah_translit: liyu'adhiba al-lahu al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-mush'rikina wal-mush'rikati wayatuba al-lahu ala al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: So that Allah may punish So that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women and the polytheist men and the polytheist women and Allah will turn (in Mercy) and Allah will turn (in Mercy) to the believing men and the believing women And Allah is And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكَٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمَۢا
